mapper.select: SELECT ImagePath as path FROM config
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO blogimage (PID, PATH, IMAGE, FILESIZE) VALUES ((select max(a.pid) from blogcontent a), #{path}, #{filename}, #{filesize});
INSERT INTO blogcontent (pid, title, content, thumbnail, nowdate) VALUES ((select max(a.pid+1) from blogcontent a), #{title}, #{contents}, #{thumbnail}, now());
